Description: Drag the top part of your will/notes/death note to move them!.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Auto-save will
CheckboxSettings.Description: Will save your will whenever you deselect the text of your will.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Use old controls
CheckboxSettings.Description: Instead of clicking on the top of the objects to move them, right click in any part of them to do it. If you are having problems moving your things, use this setting.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Use rough estimates
CheckboxSettings.Description: If you are having problems with the limits for moving your things, use this setting. This will only work with the "Use old controls" setting.

DropdownSettings.Name: Middle-click Functionality
DropdownSettings.Description:
Adds a special ability to your middle click
Centralize: will set every movable object to the default position
Go here: will instantly teleport all visible movable objects to where your mouse is.
